app_descript:
Brief

Google Primer is an innovative learning app designed to offer quick, easy-to-understand lessons to help individuals improve their business and marketing skills. Each lesson takes just 5 minutes or less to complete, making it ideal for busy professionals or entrepreneurs looking to enhance their expertise on the go.
